description.value:
Gleaming flakes of chilling snow fall in a @Template[type:burst|distance:10] within 60 feet. Each creature in the area takes @Damage[(floor((max(1,@actor.level)-1)/2)+2)d4[cold]] damage with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classDC.value)|basic:true] save against your class DC. The ground in the area is covered in a snow drift, which is difficult terrain. Each square of the drift lasts until it melts, either naturally or until fire damage is dealt in that square.

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1d4.
